import { Toast, ToastContainer, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { ArrowReturnRight, PencilFill, TrashFill } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; export default function Comment({ parentPost, posts, commentId, user, dispatchUser, addPost, removePost, editPost, }) { const replyHandler = () => {}; return (
{user.data.email}
{posts[commentId].text}
Reply mins ago
); }
